attributes.action: have a vote of confidance in his suitability  to be prime minister of britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: he has denied the country a referendum on the eu constitution,and signing away our soverignity is an act of treason.and if he does so should face criminal charges for doing so.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
